title: [SOLVED] Skin didnt unlock after i unlocked it
body: I brought blitzcrack because i had a Definitely Not Blitzcrack skin shard, after unlocking him i unlocked the skin but i dont have it :(

replies.body:
Ahhhh it looks like you may have accidentally disenchanted that shard instead of redeeming it like you were wanting to. I'm gonna go ahead and reverse that for you in case that was an accident, so you should be able to redeem it correctly this time. 

Make sure you look at those options carefully!
Thank you so much, i probably did as i was in the hype of getting him
